column4: Ed is trying to install Calibre, but it won't install because of a broken libqt4 dependency, he tried from the software center and from the terminal
install from a 3rd-party download, or is Calibre in repos?
the stuff that gets installed when you invoke "sudo apt-get install..." comes from the repos
best thing to do is just poke around, hang out here and ask questions as they occur.
